title: 1983: A Film About a Ritchey MountainBike
content:
1983 was a pivotal year in the beginning of the almighty MountainBike. Shimano introduced Deer Head M700, MKS, the XCii sealed cartridge bearing pedal, and just a year prior, Ritchey debuted the Everest. Shown here in its vernacular: NorCal fire roads and singletrackâ€¦

The post 1983: A Film About a Ritchey MountainBike appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
